clubsData.name: CODING CLUB
clubsData.description: The Coding Club is a platform for students to learn and practice coding. It is a place where students can come together to learn and grow. It is a place where students can come together to learn and grow.

clubsData.name: CYBER COP
clubsData.description: The Cyber Cop is a platform for students to learn and practice cyber security. It is a place where students can come together to learn and grow. It is a place where students can come together to learn and grow.

mentorsHeads.name: Prof.(Dr.) Shashi K. Jain
mentorsHeads.quote: Empowering students to lead and innovate

teamMembers.name: Sahil Kumar
teamMembers.quote: Guiding the next generation of leaders

clubs.name: coding
clubs.mission: To inspire, educate, and equip students with coding skills, fostering a community of innovative thinkers and collaborative problem solvers.
clubs.vision: To create a vibrant community where students excel in coding, drive technological innovation, and shape the future through impactful solutions.

LEADERS.name: Prabhat Kumar
LEADERS.msg: I warmly welcome you as we begin another promising year of dedication and service. Together, we will build an inclusive and innovative environment where every student voice matters.
